channel.title: [Suggestion] A simple fix for the Prince
channel.description: Here is a simple suggestion fix for the Prince. Have the Prince AUTO RANDOM jails if he doesn't select a number, this will prevent all the N1 no jails, heck even the veterans sometimes forget to jail n1....

item.title: [Suggestion] A simple fix for the Prince
item.dc:creator: ThePlex
item.source: [Suggestion] A simple fix for the Prince

item.title: [Suggestion] A simple fix for the Prince
item.dc:creator: PandaKing
item.description:
Auto Jail if you forget to choose a number, if you do click on your ability you can choose a number or the option “Nothing” to not jail.

Read full topic
item.source: [Suggestion] A simple fix for the Prince

item.title: [Suggestion] A simple fix for the Prince
item.dc:creator: Satan
item.description:
As jailing is a really valuable ability I like the idea of having a good situation alternative that you have to think about using instead of jailing but that may make prince too OP

Read full topic
item.source: [Suggestion] A simple fix for the Prince

item.title: [Suggestion] A simple fix for the Prince
item.dc:creator: Moleland
item.description:
It’s a nice idea, but it’s a buff to essentially the most powerful class in the game

Read full topic
item.source: [Suggestion] A simple fix for the Prince

item.title: [Suggestion] A simple fix for the Prince
item.dc:creator: grahfite
item.description:
Why not instead give Prince a different Night Time ability if they’re in their personal room instead of jail? Maybe a one time Night immunity to death or the Marshall’s Snoop so they’re not 100% useless if they forgot to jail.

Read full topic
item.source: [Suggestion] A simple fix for the Prince

item.description:
Here is a simple suggestion fix for the Prince. Have the Prince AUTO RANDOM jails if he doesn’t select a number, this will prevent all the N1 no jails, heck even the veterans sometimes forget to jail n1…
